sentence.english: Are they becoming more adventurous in their travels?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se están volviendo más aventureros en sus viajes?

sentence.english: Are they becoming more ambitious in their careers?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se están volviendo más ambiciosos en sus carreras?

sentence.english: He was acting arrogant during the meeting.
sentence.spanish: Él estuvo actuando de forma altanera durante la reunión.

sentence.english: She isn't just clever; she also works very hard.
sentence.spanish: Ella no es solo inteligente; también trabaja muy duro.

sentence.english: Was the receptionist cold towards you yesterday?
sentence.spanish: ¿La recepcionista fue fría contigo ayer?

sentence.english: She isn't feeling confident about her presentation.
sentence.spanish: Ella no se siente segura sobre su presentación.

sentence.english: He wasn't feeling very creative last week.
sentence.spanish: Él no se sentía muy creativo la semana pasada.

sentence.english: He isn't an extrovert, but he's trying to be more outgoing at parties.
sentence.spanish: Él no es extrovertido, pero está intentando ser más abierto en las fiestas.

sentence.english: Are the new neighbours being friendly to you?
sentence.spanish: ¿Los nuevos vecinos están siendo amigables contigo?

sentence.english: She wasn't feeling funny yesterday because of her mood.
sentence.spanish: Ella no estaba feeling divertida ayer debido a su estado de ánimo.

sentence.english: He is being very generous with his time lately.
sentence.spanish: Él está siendo muy generoso con su tiempo últimamente.

sentence.english: Are they hard-working employees in your company?
sentence.spanish: ¿Son empleados trabajadores en tu empresa?

sentence.english: Are you always honest with your feelings?
sentence.spanish: ¿Siempre eres honesto con tus sentimientos?

sentence.english: She isn't losing her humble attitude despite her success.
sentence.spanish: Ella no está perdiendo su actitud humilde a pesar de su éxito.

sentence.english: Are you finding the lecture interesting?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te parece interesante la conferencia?

sentence.english: He is embracing his introvert nature more these days.
sentence.spanish: Él está aceptando más su naturaleza introvertida estos días.

sentence.english: Were they kind to you when you first moved here?
sentence.spanish: ¿Fueron amables contigo cuando te mudaste aquí por primera vez?

sentence.english: I'm not being lazy; I'm just tired today.
sentence.spanish: No estoy siendo perezoso; solo estoy cansado hoy.

sentence.english: Are they mean to new students at your school?
sentence.spanish: ¿Son malos con los estudiantes nuevos en tu escuela?

sentence.english: She isn't being nosy; she's just concerned.
sentence.spanish: Ella no está siendo entrometida; solo está preocupada.

sentence.english: She is remaining optimistic despite the challenges.
sentence.spanish: Ella se mantiene optimista a pesar de los desafíos.

sentence.english: Are they being pessimistic about the results?
sentence.spanish: ¿Están siendo pesimistas sobre los resultados?

sentence.english: He was always polite to his elders.
sentence.spanish: Él siempre fue educado con sus mayores.

sentence.english: He was unusually quiet during dinner last night.
sentence.spanish: Él estuvo inusualmente callado durante la cena anoche.

sentence.english: Are you becoming more reserved as you get older?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te estás volviendo más reservado a medida que envejeces?

sentence.english: She isn't being very responsible with her deadlines.
sentence.spanish: Ella no está siendo muy responsable con sus plazos.

sentence.english: He isn't usually rude to service staff.
sentence.spanish: Él no suele ser grosero con el personal de servicio.

sentence.english: Are they being selfish with their resources?
sentence.spanish: ¿Están siendo egoístas con sus recursos?

sentence.english: He wasn't very sensitive to her feelings yesterday.
sentence.spanish: Él no fue muy sensible con sus sentimientos ayer.

sentence.english: She isn't always serious; she knows how to have fun.
sentence.spanish: Ella no siempre es seria; sabe divertirse.

sentence.english: Are you feeling shy about speaking in public?
sentence.spanish: ¿Te sientes tímido para hablar en público?

sentence.english: She isn't very sociable at large gatherings.
sentence.spanish: Ella no es muy sociable en grandes reuniones.

sentence.english: Were they stingy with the portions at the restaurant?
sentence.spanish: ¿Fueron tacaños con las porciones en el restaurante?

sentence.english: She wasn't very talkative during the meeting.
sentence.spanish: Ella no fue muy habladora durante la reunión.

sentence.english: He was too timid to ask for help yesterday.
sentence.spanish: Él fue demasiado tímido para pedir ayuda ayer.

sentence.english: He proved himself trustworthy during the crisis.
sentence.spanish: Él demostró ser confiable durante la crisis.

sentence.english: The shop assistant wasn't unfriendly, just busy.
sentence.spanish: El dependiente no fue antipático, solo estaba ocupado.

sentence.english: He isn't always warm with strangers.
sentence.spanish: Él no siempre es cálido con los desconocidos.

sentence.english: She isn't well-dressed for the job interview.
sentence.spanish: Ella no va bien vestida para la entrevista de trabajo.

sentence.english: He looks young for his age.
sentence.spanish: Él parece joven para su edad.
